posts.content:
The agenda:

Friday
Gates open at 02:00 pm
Welcome pack on arrival. Unloading buses and setting up camp. Swapping and trading Barn Door parts etc.
Evening, a casual affair probably spent in the pub for most people?.

Saturday
Communal breakfast. Swapping and trading Barn Door parts again.
Barn Door line up and photo shoot. Evening entertainment TBC.

Sunday
Communal breakfast, more trading, second photo shoot (Volksworld), possible cruise to local place of interest (pending).
Weekend comes to an end when the last person leaves! Probably around about 03:00/04:00 pm.

Also
If anyone has a small generator and lighting it would be really handy (I will cover the cost of the fuel .

Cheers Rikki.

Barn Door list:

1. Rikki James. 1954 Samba
2. Alan Scott. 1952 kombi ( rhd )
3. J D. 1954 UK delivered Kombi
4. Ben. 1954 kombi
5. Ben & Mo. One of them Barndoors
6. Ned & Vic. 51 standard if it's solid enough to trailer!
7. Wiskers. 54 Samba
8. Martin Coombes 54 Coke Cola
9. Michael Cooper 54 Kombi
10. Mike & Charlie. 53 panelvan
11. Craig & Holly 51 panel
12. Dai and Lou, 50 kombi
13. Rob Underwood 53 kombi
14. Michael John Riley 54 panel
15 . Peter Golding 51 opening rear hatch kombi I think !
16. Lee moorhouse 54 kombi
17. Karl & Susie The 54 Steiner Rad Samba
18 Chez and the brown hound 53 Kombi
19. Ian Mac 52 Deluxe
20. David & Kerra 52 Kombi
21. Mark & Evelyn 51 Kempes panelvan

Non Barndoor list:

1. Christian Peck 60 Samba
2. Mike and Susie 1959 Kombi
3. Caroline Harding 63 Canterbury Pitt

Work commitments closer the time dictate but.
22. Jay and Deb 54 SC

Hi Rikki,

Update on the bridge at Radcott. I was down that way last night and the bridge was open but at a reduced width, plenty of room to get a bus over though. Apparently it's still closing at certain times of the day for the repair work but I'm guessing the damage isn't as bad as first feared seeing as they are letting traffic over.

Looks like you'll be fine for the big day ;o)

Cheers

Will
Hi, would like to pop over in the Oval on the Saturday to get a few pics, if that's ok.

brazilnut wrote:Hi, would like to pop over in the Oval on the Saturday to get a few pics, if that's ok.

Of course it's ok !
